characters.name: Ethan
characters.description: A young village blacksmith apprentice who accidentally discovers he is the heir to the Guardian bloodline, shouldering the mission to find the Star-fallen Blade.

characters.name: Aria
characters.description: A mysterious elven ranger skilled in archery and nature magic, who knows the legend of the Star-fallen Blade inside out, but her true motives seem to be more than just helping Ethan.

characters.name: Torin
characters.description: A dwarf warrior from an ancient mountain clan, skilled in battle axe and forging, loyal to Ethan's mission but skeptical of magic.

characters.name: Lila
characters.description: A human mage proficient in fire and illusion magic, seemingly witty and humorous, but actually harbors connections with dark forces.

characters.name: Kael
characters.description: Leader of the dark forces, a mysterious shadow sorcerer who covets the Star-fallen Blade and attempts to awaken the demon god to rule the world.
